revision.text:
In '''shops''', various currencies can be exchanged for useful items such as [[Evolution Items]], [[Eggs]], and [[Pokéballs]]. The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of Masterballs and [[Protein]], shop items can be decreased by defeating route Pokémon. ==[[Kanto]]: Locations and items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Region !! City Name !!
